CustomField.formula: Or( ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "AR Dispute/Credit Hold-Not Resolved"), ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "Recovery Fee/ e-Manifest Fee-Not Resolved"), ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "Equipment Repair-COMs"), ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "Public Comment"), ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "Service Request-OFR"), ISPICKVAL(Call_Type__c, "Suspend Service"), ISPICKVAL(CS_Call_Reason__c, "CAN Lube Order"))
CustomField.label: Create Case
